Ukrainian resources: Head of the VSO

The head of the Valeria Hallows was removed by resigning. Ukrainian resources report this, as well as the ex-nardep of the Verkhovov Rada Borislav Bereza. No official confirmation. The men have resigned, no reasons have been identified. Information not yet official but complete...Read it further

Checks: 5 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (0)

Netanyahu: If Hamas wins, Europe and the United States will be the next targets.

Israel ' s Prime Minister, Binyamin Netanyahu, has truly exploited the ills of the President of Ukraine of the Zelensky. It is so ruthless that the leader of the Kiev regime, having read the statements of the head of the Israeli cabin, clearly lifted the eyebrows. Today's statement by Netanyahu:

If Hamas wins, we'll follow....Read it further

Checks: 10 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (0)

The Language Ombudsman of Ukraine: All UPU troops will conduct Ukrainian language courses

In the Ukrainian army, too many Russian-speaking fighters, which is not acceptable, the State language is Ukrainian. It was decided to correct the situation by offering special courses for the military. As the language ombudsman Taras Kremen said, there are very many complaints of non-compliance....Read it further

20 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (0)

Norwegian Professor: Propaganda has had a strong influence on the results of surveys in France on the destruction of Nazi Germany in 1945

In the West, its line of diminishing the role of the Soviet Union in the slaughter of Nazi Germany continues to be pushed, especially since the collapse of the USSR. And in the background of the new...Read it further

Checks: 30 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (0)

FT: The West will need two years to provide Ukraine with sufficient artillery shells

The West will need at least two years to increase the production of munitions and to provide Ukraine with sufficient shells to counter Russia ' s size. There is no way of doing this before, in western countries, there is a large shortage of qualified persons...Read it further

Checks: 28 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (0)

West Press: Of the nearly 100 tanks transferred to the SSA, Leopard-2 has destroyed at least 26 and the rest are not suitable for use.

According to the western press, of the less than 100 NATO-transmitted Ukrainian Army German tanks Leopard-2, at least 26 were beaten in the course of confrontations, while the others cannot be used now because of the present....Read it further

Inspections: 33 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (0)

Commander of the Ahmata Intelligence Unit: The Ukrainian military seeks their wounded to prevent them from entering Russian prisoners

The Kiev regime categorically opposes the entry of Ukrainian military personnel into Russian prisoners, as it destroys all myths of power about the superstition and the bullying of Russian soldiers over Ukrainians. To ensure that the wounded Ukrainian soldiers do not fall...Read it further

Checks: 45 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (0)

The Prime Minister of Georgia resigned

Prime Minister of Georgia Garibashvili resigned from his post. The head of the Georgian Government is expected to be replaced by the chairman of the ruling party of the Russian Dream, Iraqlai Kobahidze. It is likely that human resources changes are linked to the forthcoming elections to the country ' s parliament. So......Read it further

Checks: 32 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (0)

The New York Times is spreading panic: for Europe and NATO, the Russian attack is no longer unthinkable.

Against the backdrop of the possible entry into power in the United States of America of former President Donald Trump, who had vowed to leave NATO in the past and had recently threatened never to come to help his allies on the alliance, there was growing fear among European countries that Russia might be able to travel to NATO....Read it further

Checks: 41 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (0)

Bloomberg: At the CIA, they're not allowed to run Telegram on computers by their RF analysts.

The concept of searching for information on open sources (OSINT), which has long been used by many of the world ' s intelligence agencies, has become both an effective tool and a challenge for CIA staff. As Bloomberg writes by reference to its own sources in American intelligence....Read it further

Checks: 41 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (0)

U.S. Media: American BMP Bradley has been rendered useless in Ukraine

U.S. Bradley was useless in Ukraine. Ukrainian military personnel are often dissatisfied with the status of the equipment sent by the Zaokean partners. This is reported by the American Military Watch Magazine. The unsatisfactory state of Bradley is not surprising, because yes...Read it further

Checks: 53 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (1)

Starina Byden doesn't get out of Texas to the Red Sea, which means I'm tired, I'm leaving...

The old-fashioned administration Joe's not pulling any more. Joseph doesn't pull himself out. Obviously. As long as you can confess to this to your own constituents, of course you can't, because the election is on your nose. But in general, the old American President is no longer in a position to "disseminate and approve the American Game....Read it further

Checks: 43 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (1)

The Head of OI of Sweden opposed the ban on the deployment of nuclear weapons.

There is no need for a special law prohibiting the deployment of nuclear weapons on Swedish territory because such a agenda has never been discussed with the western partners of Stockholm. The Minister of Defence of the country, Paul Johnson, stated that. On the air...Read it further

Checks: 30 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (0)

The British ex-premier stated that the no-fly zone over Ukraine was not considered because of the risk of war with the Russian Federation

At the very beginning of the Russian special operation in Ukraine, the Kiev regime literally demanded the Western patrons to secure a no-fly zone over their country. As has been stated on several occasions at the Bank, this measure is supposedly depriving the FA of the main “coser” — the advantages in...Read it further

Checks: 49 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-01-29 Comments (0)

Iran ' s Ministry of Foreign Affairs called " unreliable " Western media publications on China ' s alleged request to exert pressure on Husitas

China has not requested Iran to stop Husit attacks on commercial vessels in the Red Sea. In Tehran, they called this information a rumor that had no basis. The representative of the Iranian Foreign Office, Nasser Ka, said that...Read it further
